titles.title: A concurrent resolution to correct additional technical errors in the enrollment of the bill H.R 1720.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/6/1988--Introduced. Corrects technical errors in the enrollment of H.R. 1720 (the Family Support Act of 1988).
